He is a pile of shit. A stupid, stupid man with a limited vocabulary. He loves no one but himself. He believes in no god, he thinks what he speaks becomes true and he is therefore his own god.  I remember at one of his first press conferences when a reporter from Scotland asked him a question and he said, "They love he in Scotland," when in fact they find him vulgar and they despise him. He was such a horrible prick that the neighbors to his shitty golf course all flew Mexican flags when he flew there for the opening of the course. One person even held a sign that said "Trump is a C#NT".  He has to convince himself that everyone loves him or else he would implode because he requires constant praise and admiration the way everyone else requires water and oxygen. It's exhausting being in a relationship with a malignant narcissist because your feelings really don't matter, even if they sometimes pretend they do-- the only thing that matters is that he is praised constantly-- exhausting. That need for praise is insatiable, and the more he gets the more he needs because it leaves him feeling empty because it is never enough, and deep inside he knows it isn't deserved. This administration will easily turn out to be the most corrupt in history, even surpassing Ronald Reagan's administration over the Iran-Contra scandal, which Ronny conveniently couldn't remember a damn thing-- 138 investigations with some idictments and prison terms. Trump will be even worse. When he dies and tries to move on to the next existence, if he is lucky to pass out of this world, he will find himself in utter darkness without praise, without attention, without fuss, without makeup, and alone and it will torment his crippled soul that has been stuffed in that hideous amoeba of a blob/body... the first will truly be the last and he will pay for every second he stole from someone else, for every thing he took credit for and didn't earn and for every blame he laid on another when the blame was his own. This is his fate. He cannot escape it. What wicked deeds he does not pay for in this life, he will certainly pay for it in the next. Sealed upon his banana yellow/white streaks/dreadfully thin/straw "hair system" for time and into the next existence.  So it is written, so it shall be done.
